resources.string:
Steps to use this app: 
 1. Pair your band with the phone
 2. Make sure Microsoft Health is installed
 3. Press the Start button
 4. Data from the accelerometer sensor should be displayed.
Band is not paired with your phone.
Band is not connected. Please make sure bluetooth is on and the band is in range.
Microsoft Health BandService does not support your SDK Version. Please update to latest SDK.
Microsoft Health BandService is not available. Please make sure Microsoft Health is installed and that you have the correct permissions.
